inspirationalQuotes.text: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspirationalQuotes.text: Your skin is your largest organ. Take care of it with love and patience.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Dr. Howard Murad

inspirationalQuotes.text: True beauty is not about perfection, it's about embracing your unique self.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Alicia Keys

inspirationalQuotes.text: Let your skin breathe the silence of care, and your glow will whisper confidence.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Beauty lives in moments of gentleness — a soft touch, a calm breath, a patient heart.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Care for your skin as you would a memory — tenderly, without rush, with love.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: You bloom quietly when you learn to listen to your body.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Radiance is born from rest, not rush.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: In caring for your skin, you practice the art of slowing time.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: The glow you seek is the peace you keep.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Beauty doesn’t ask to be seen — it simply exists, softly.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Every ritual of care is a quiet conversation with yourself.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Your reflection is not what you see, but how kindly you see it.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Happiness is the best makeup. Take care of your inner glow first.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Drew Barrymore

inspirationalQuotes.text: Confidence breeds beauty. When you feel good, you look even better.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Blake Lively

inspirationalQuotes.text: Taking care of your skin is more important than covering it up.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

inspirationalQuotes.text: Self-care is how you take your power back.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Lalah Delia
